name: Rain Shaman
description:
Addictive and challenging FREE classic arcade game with delightful graphics and 15 charming characters! Test your reflexes and ability to concentrate, practice and you'll see yourself improve along the way! 

In a land not far away lives a mighty Shaman with the power of rainmaking. Unfortunately, he made a terrible mistake while summoning rain: although he succeeded in bringing draught to an end, he also made frogs fall from the sky! Help the Rain Shaman fix the mess he created by sending the rain and frogs flying where they belong, and discover the secret conjuration that will grant him the forgiveness of the Gods.

FEATURES: 
* Decrypt the Rain Shaman secret conjuration. 
* Discover new heights.
* Unlock exclusive characters. 
* Enjoy multiple backgrounds and hidden tricks.
* Challenge your friends and compete.

Rain Shaman is free to download and can be played without making In App Purchases. However, you can upgrade the game to remove the ads and unlock all characters. In App Purchases can be disabled by turning off this feature in your device.

Download now and help the Rain Shamans sort things out!
